statements: SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_type, status FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = 'on';
SELECT device_name, voice_command_supported FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'light';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE voice_command_supported = true;
SELECT device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Alexa%';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT MAX(device_id) FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_id = 5;
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'thermostat';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = 'off' AND voice_command_supported = true;
SELECT device_name, device_type, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE voice_command_supported = false;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'camera' AND status = 'on';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT device_type) FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, device_type, voice_command_supported FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = 'on' OR voice_command_supported = false;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = 'on';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM smart_home_devices WHERE voice_command_supported = true;
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat' AND status = 'on';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Kitchen%';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Speaker' AND voice_command_supported = true;
SELECT AVG(device_id) AS avg_device_id FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = 'off';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light' OR device_type = 'Camera';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE voice_command_supported = false AND status = 'off';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type IN ('Light', 'Speaker');
SELECT MAX(device_id) AS max_device_id FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Security' AND voice_command_supported = true;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = 'on' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT MIN(device_id) AS min_device_id FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE voice_command_supported = true;
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat' AND status = 'off';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name = 'Living Room Light';
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = 'on';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, status FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT command_id, command_name, device_id, voice_trigger FROM voice_commands;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'light';
SELECT command_name, voice_trigger FROM voice_commands WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type IN ('light', 'thermostat');
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = FALSE;
SELECT command_name FROM voice_commands WHERE voice_trigger = 'turn on lights';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Kitchen%';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'door' AND status = TRUE;
SELECT command_name, voice_trigger FROM voice_commands WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = TRUE AND device_type = 'thermostat';
SELECT command_name, voice_trigger FROM voice_commands WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = TRUE AND device_type = 'light';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type <> 'light';
SELECT command_name FROM voice_commands WHERE voice_trigger LIKE '%lights%';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT command_name, voice_trigger FROM voice_commands ORDER BY command_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type='Lighting' AND status=true;
SELECT device_name, voice_trigger FROM smart_home_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_id = voice_commands.device_id WHERE smart_home_devices.device_type='Thermostat';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Thermostats FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type='Thermostat';
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS Total_Voice_Commands FROM smart_home_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_id = voice_commands.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT MAX(command_id) AS Highest_Command_ID FROM voice_commands;
SELECT device_name, device_type, case when status then 'Active' else 'Inactive' end as device_status FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT AVG(command_id) AS Average_Command_ID FROM voice_commands;

SELECT device_name, device_type, COUNT(*) AS Total_Voice_Commands FROM smart_home_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_id = voice_commands.device_id GROUP BY device_name, device_type;
SELECT DISTINCT(device_name) FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, voice_trigger FROM smart_home_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_id = voice_commands.device_id WHERE status=true;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Lighting_Devices FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type='Lighting';
SELECT command_name, voice_trigger FROM voice_commands;

SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS Total_Voice_Commands FROM smart_home_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_id = voice_commands.device_id WHERE smart_home_devices.status=true GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT MIN(command_id) AS Lowest_Command_ID FROM voice_commands;
SELECT device_name, device_type, SUM(command_id) AS Total_Command_IDs FROM smart_home_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_id = voice_commands.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Thermostats FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status=true AND device_type='Thermostat';
SELECT device_name, command_name, voice_trigger FROM smart_home_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_id = voice_commands.device_id WHERE device_type='Lighting';
SELECT DISTINCT(device_name), device_type FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, COUNT(*) AS Total_Commands FROM smart_home_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_id = voice_commands.device_id GROUP BY device_name, device_type;
SELECT AVG(command_id) AS Average_Command_ID FROM voice_commands WHERE command_id < 100;

SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS Total_Voice_Commands FROM smart_home_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_id = voice_commands.device_id WHERE device_type='Thermostat' GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT command_name, command_description FROM voice_commands;
SELECT user_name, preferred_device_id FROM user_preferences;
SELECT u.user_name, d.device_name FROM user_preferences u INNER JOIN smart_home_devices d ON u.preferred_device_id = d.device_id;
SELECT u.user_name, d.device_type FROM user_preferences u INNER JOIN smart_home_devices d ON u.preferred_device_id = d.device_id WHERE d.device_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT command_id, command_name FROM voice_commands WHERE LENGTH(command_name) > 10;
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_status = FALSE;
SELECT AVG(CHAR_LENGTH(command_description)) AS avg_length FROM voice_commands;
SELECT user_name, device_name FROM user_preferences u INNER JOIN smart_home_devices d ON u.preferred_device_id = d.device_id;
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_status = TRUE GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_name;
SELECT MAX(CHAR_LENGTH(device_name)) AS max_length FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_preferences u INNER JOIN smart_home_devices d ON u.preferred_device_id = d.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT user_name, d.device_name FROM user_preferences u LEFT JOIN smart_home_devices d ON u.preferred_device_id = d.device_id;
SELECT d.device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_preferences u RIGHT JOIN smart_home_devices d ON u.preferred_device_id = d.device_id GROUP BY d.device_name;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE command_description LIKE '%voice%';
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_status FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light';
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_name, device_name FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id;
SELECT device_name, command_name, command_description FROM smart_home_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_type = voice_commands.command_name;
SELECT user_name, device_name, device_status FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_status = FALSE;
SELECT user_name, device_type FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_device_id IS NULL;
SELECT user_name, device_name FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';

SELECT user_name, device_name, command_name, command_description FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_type = voice_commands.command_name;

SELECT user_name, device_name, device_status FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id WHERE device_type = 'Light' AND device_status = TRUE;

SELECT device_name, command_name, command_description FROM smart_home_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_type = voice_commands.command_name WHERE device_type IN ('Light', 'Speaker');

SELECT user_name, device_name, device_type FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id WHERE device_type LIKE '%%thermostat%%';
SELECT user_name, device_name FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id WHERE device_status = TRUE OR device_status = FALSE;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(preferred_device_id) FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_name;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(user_id) FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id GROUP BY device_name;

SELECT user_name, device_name, device_type, device_status, command_name, command_description FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_type = voice_commands.command_name;

SELECT user_name, device_name, device_type, device_status, command_name, command_description FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_type = voice_commands.command_name WHERE device_type IN ('Light', 'Speaker');

SELECT user_name, device_name, device_type, device_status, command_name, command_description FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_type = voice_commands.command_name WHERE user_name LIKE '%%John%%';

SELECT device_name, device_type, device_status, command_name, command_description FROM smart_home_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_type = voice_commands.command_name WHERE device_status = TRUE AND command_name LIKE '%%Turn on%%';

SELECT user_name, device_name, device_type, device_status, command_name, command_description FROM user_preferences JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_preferences.preferred_device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id JOIN voice_commands ON smart_home_devices.device_type...
SELECT * FROM voice_commands;
SELECT command_name, timestamp FROM voice_commands;
SELECT device_id, command_name FROM voice_commands WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';

SELECT device_id, device_name, device_status FROM smart_devices WHERE device_type = 'light';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_devices WHERE device_status = TRUE;

SELECT room_id, room_name FROM rooms WHERE room_type = 'kitchen';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT command_name, device_id FROM voice_commands WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_status FROM smart_devices WHERE device_type = 'thermostat';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE command_name LIKE '%turn%';
SELECT * FROM smart_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%lamp%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE room_name = 'living_room';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT command_name, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM smart_devices WHERE device_type = 'light';
SELECT * FROM voice_commands JOIN users ON voice_commands.device_id = users.user_id WHERE users.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM voice_commands WHERE command_name LIKE '%open%';
SELECT device_name FROM smart_devices WHERE device_status = true;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT room_name FROM rooms WHERE room_type = 'kitchen';
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) FROM smart_devices GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM voice_commands WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM smart_devices;
SELECT AVG(device_id) FROM voice_commands;
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM smart_devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM voice_commands WHERE command_name LIKE '%turn%');
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) FROM voice_commands;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM voice_commands);
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';

SELECT command_name, timestamp FROM voice_commands ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands;
SELECT command_name FROM voice_commands;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM voice_commands;
SELECT * FROM smart_devices;
SELECT device_name FROM smart_devices;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM device_logs;
SELECT * FROM user_devices;
SELECT user_id, device_id FROM user_devices;
SELECT id, command_name FROM voice_commands WHERE device_id = 'device_id';
SELECT id, device_name FROM smart_devices WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE status = 'error';
SELECT id, user_id FROM user_devices WHERE permission = 'admin';
SELECT device_id, command_id FROM device_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'user%';
SELECT * FROM voice_commands ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM smart_devices;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE status = 'error' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY permission DESC;
SELECT command_name, timestamp FROM voice_commands JOIN device_logs ON voice_commands.id = device_logs.command_id WHERE device_logs.status = 'success';
SELECT DISTINCT device_name FROM smart_devices WHERE device_type = 'thermostat';
SELECT id, device_name, device_status FROM smart_devices WHERE device_status = 'inactive' OR device_status = 'repair';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;
SELECT AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, device_logs.timestamp, NOW())) AS avg_time_diff FROM device_logs;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_commands, user_id FROM voice_commands GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN permission = 'admin' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS admin_count, SUM(CASE WHEN permission = 'user' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS user_count FROM user_devices;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) AS device_count FROM user_devices GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM smart_devices GROUP BY device_type ORDER BY device_count DESC;
SELECT command_name, COUNT(*) AS command_count FROM voice_commands GROUP BY command_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT device_name, MAX(TIMESTAMP) AS last_activity FROM device_logs JOIN smart_devices ON device_logs.device_id = smart_devices.id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, timestamp, NOW())) AS avg_activity_gap FROM device_logs JOIN smart_devices ON device_logs.device_id = smart_devices.id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM device_logs JOIN smart_devices ON device_logs.device_id = smart_devices.id GROUP BY device_name HAVING activity_count > 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM device_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-07-01';
